The following nbwrpg poll is now closed.  Here are the 
final results: 


POLL QUESTION: If there was to be a change in the
format of this RPG, what do you feel
would be the bestway to go? 

CHOICES AND RESULTS
- Absolute free-form; no moderator, 0 votes, 0.00%  
- Normal Free form; the way it is now, 2 votes, 40.00%  
- Organized free form; the council sets and applies major storylines, 3 votes, 60.00%  
- Fixed form; players have to go in directions given by the council, 0 votes, 0.00%  

INDIVIDUAL VOTES
- Absolute free-form; no moderator 
- Normal Free form; the way it is now 
     - roborick007@... 
     - airly2002@... 
- Organized free form; the council sets and applies major storylines 
     - x_rauq_x@... 
     - Proudwing500k@... 
     - lordofdarkness11001@... 
- Fixed form; players have to go in directions given by the council 


For more information about this group, please visit 
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg
